SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.mapper

Interface CourseMapper

public interface CourseMapper
MapStruct mapper interface for converting between CourseEntity and its DTO representations.

Features:

  • Automatic mapping between CourseEntity, CourseDTO, CourseNewDTO, and CourseUpdateDTO
  • Handles mapping of collections (lists) of courses and DTOs
  • Ignores userCompletions and admin fields to avoid persistence and security issues
  • Provides update methods for partial entity updates from DTOs

Usage: This interface is implemented automatically by MapStruct at build time. Inject or obtain an instance via CDI or the generated implementation for use in your service layer.

    • toDto

      CourseDTO toDto(CourseEntity courseEntity)
      Maps a CourseEntity to a CourseDTO.
      Parameters:
      courseEntity - the entity to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped DTO, or null if input is null

    • toEntity

      CourseEntity toEntity(CourseDTO courseDTO)
      Maps a CourseDTO to a CourseEntity. Ignores userCompletions and admin fields; set these in the service layer if needed.
      Parameters:
      courseDTO - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • toEntity

      Maps a CourseUpdateDTO to a CourseEntity. Ignores userCompletions and admin fields; set these in the service layer if needed.

      courseUpdateDTO - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • toEntity

      CourseEntity toEntity(CourseNewDTO courseNewDTO)
      Maps a CourseNewDTO to a CourseEntity. Ignores userCompletions, admin, and id fields; set these in the service layer if needed.
      Parameters:
      courseNewDTO - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • toDtoList

      List<CourseDTO> toDtoList(List<CourseEntity> courses)
      Maps a list of CourseEntity objects to a list of CourseDTO objects.
      Parameters:
      courses - the list of entities to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped list of DTOs (empty if input is empty or null)

    • toEntityList

      List<CourseEntity> toEntityList(List<CourseDTO> courseDTOs)
      Maps a list of CourseDTO objects to a list of CourseEntity objects.
      Parameters:
      courseDTOs - the list of DTOs to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped list of entities (empty if input is empty or null)

    • updateEntityFromDto

      void updateEntityFromDto(CourseDTO courseDTO, CourseEntity courseEntity)
      Updates an existing CourseEntity with values from a CourseDTO.

      Useful for partial updates while preserving existing entity relationships and IDs. Ignores userCompletions and admin fields to avoid accidental changes.

      Parameters:
      courseDTO - the DTO containing the new values
      courseEntity - the existing entity to update (modified in place)

    • updateEntityFromUpdateDto

      void updateEntityFromUpdateDto(CourseUpdateDTO courseUpdateDTO, CourseEntity courseEntity)
      Updates an existing CourseEntity with values from a CourseUpdateDTO.

      Useful for partial updates while preserving existing entity relationships and IDs. Ignores userCompletions and admin fields to avoid accidental changes.

      Parameters:
      courseUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the new values
      courseEntity - the existing entity to update (modified in place)
